website_summaries.verdict: This double-walled, vacuum-insulated coozie is the top of the line. It will keep your drink cold for a very long time.
pros: Really does the job of keeping your drink cold (or hot)
Holds a can or beer bottle
does not tend to dent when dropped

customer_reviews.title: Fake - Sold by Amazon.com LLC
customer_reviews.text: The Colster I received did not have laser etching on the bottom like a genuine one. It did not include the can or sticker or mini catalog. It weighs less than an authentic Colster. The label has several spacing errors, frostbit is misspelled, The logo on the lid is clear on the genuine one, but not on the fake one. The brown background is solid on the fake label, but looks like dirt on the genuine label.
customer_reviews.author: D. Scheideman

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic Yeti colster
customer_reviews.text: Not an authentic Yeti colster. Bottom of the colster fails to provide certain information that can be found on the bottom of real Yeti colsters.
customer_reviews.author: Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Mine was not a fake. Real Yeti
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the reviews call this model a fake. Worried, I quickly bought a second one directly from YETI.com and planned to return the one I bought from amazon. After receiving both, they appear to be completely identical. Both weigh 11.6 oz and have the aluminum can inside. Both have a serial number on the bottom. Completely identical. I notice that most of the dates calling this item a fake are from 2 years ago. So maybe amazon solved the problem? However, buy at your own risk I guess but I got lucky and definitely received a real one!
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED. INACCURATE PHOTO
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew’s birthday and the photo is completely inaccurate compared to the product I received. I wanted it to hold a beer or soda can and it is to hold a cup of coffee. He is now flying back to Florida and it is very inconvenient to have to return it, attempt to find the correct size, then send it to Florida. If the photo had been accurate, it would save a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Not a Yeti!
customer_reviews.text: It's not a Yeti. Collar will not screw on a standard 12 ounce can.
customer_reviews.author: SteveR73

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is fake Yeti. No imprint on the bottom. Designed in Texas - Made in China. No mock can insert & no Yeti sticker. Returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: michael g livernois

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy online. Buy from a store.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these from a store for my wife and I. We loved them. We were referred to this from my father who bought it from a store. I tried buying one online and the product is defective. It doesn't screw on right. The top piece isn't made right. It won't screw on to my wife's or my yeti. This product was purchased for my grandmothers birthday. Now I'll have to pay to return this to try and get one that will work right.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Yeti is a great brand!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love the Yeti rambler. With some much knock-off crap being sold out there today I feel it’s best to stick to reputable brands you can count on like Yeti. It is definitely high quality like you would expect from this company. It’s the perfect size for cans and the shorter beer bottles. It keeps our drinks cool for a very long time. Perfect for summer - camping or at home. If you want it a little taller for the larger cans and bottles there is an adapter you can get that adds some height at the top. It’s black so matches this perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t a fake. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Don’t be deterred from reviews regarding it being a fake. Authentic product, keeps the beer cold. Do yourself a favor and buy two.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Overrated & Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: For many years, we've been using "The Fridge" to keep our cola's cold. Ours are wearing out and I decided to try Yeti. 1. They look nice and are well made. 2. They're expensive. 3. The don't hold a candle to keeping soda cold like "The Fridge." The Fridge is freezable and has gel inside the body which not only keeps a soda, or beer, cold; it makes it colder and at much less cost. Do you want to be fashionable or have your sodas and beer stay cold. Your choice. I don't work for the company that makes "The Fridge," nor do I sell them. I'm just giving my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Yeti did a great job with this rambler. Great for fishing, camping, or sitting by the camp fire. Holds cans nice and snug. The screw on cap is a little too tight for beer bottles. It still works but you need to force the cap down the threads to screw it on. I highly suggest storing this rambler in the freezer at home or in your ice filled cooler if your out and about. It holds temperature well enough that it actually lowers the temperature of cans and bottles even if they're already cold. After taking out of the freezer, your first 2 or 3 drinks will be more frosty than taking them straight from the fridge or cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Holds cans & most standard glass bottles tight. Drinks stay cold to the last drop, but it hasn’t been warm out yet. Didn’t rate durability as I haven’t had it long, but it seems pretty rugged. 03Apr20 Update: After using this a few days, I’m giving it another star. Expensive for a koosie to be sure, but this thing is fantastic. For cans it’s a perfect fit and retains the cold a super long time. The fact that it also holds bottles is a nice bonus. Not sure what the semi-soft plastic material is that’s holding cans/bottles in but it’s genius. Even more so if it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Xtreeeeem!

customer_reviews.title: Brrrrr..... Keeps a can of Coke COLD.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Yeti Rambler. It keeps a can of Coke cold for HOURS. This is my second one - the first one I received as a gift and it stays at home. It showed me how great the Yeti worked, so I ordered this second one for work. I had been using another brand of can cooler, where you had to freeze the bottom disc, but it warmed up way too fast. That company didn't sell just that bottom disc (so you could leave one in the freezer, while using the other one) you had to order the whole thing again, which was about the same price as the Yeti Rambler. I highly recommend the Yeti Rambler.
customer_reviews.author: Tangled

customer_reviews.title: I received a yeti thermos for Christmas and I liked it so much that I bought this colster
customer_reviews.text: I received a yeti thermos for Christmas and I liked it so much that I bought this colster. It was shipped on a timely manner and was packaged very nicely. The teal color is pretty and true to the picture. It keeps cans cold for hours. Highly recommend 👍 Some other reviewers are saying they they received fakes. My colster came with a yeti sticker and a catalog and the color matches perfectly with my yeti thermos that came from Dick's Sporting Goods. I'm pretty sure mine is real.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Sample

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and we use them every day. Keeps drinks cold for hours. One note, it doesn't fit all cans. My Monster Energy will fit, but can't be used with the black ring screw on top. Certain Diet Coke and other cans won't fit with the black ring either. Safeway refreshe seltzer fits perfectly. Even without the black ring, drinks still remain cold, just for not as long. Beer bottles will fit with the black ring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic as authentic gets.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely real and registered fine. Came with the stash can, sticker etc. I have other authentic yeti products and laser etching and raised logo is exactly the same as the other ones. :) If you found this review to be helpful, please click "helpful" below. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: N3RDgirl

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy as I’ve accidentally dropped it and there was no damage or dents. It keeps the beer pretty cold but not as much as anticipated. There are design issues with the cup. They need a cover that flips up and down to help insulate the cans when not taking a drink. It’s also difficult to drink to the bottom of the can; you have to fully tip your head back up to the sky for the last inch or two of liquid in the can. It’s really an expensive novelty as everyone notices the brand and thinks it must be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RayNJulie

customer_reviews.title: have To use the inner can As a regular 12oz can, the ring won’t screw on. But does keep it cold.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed as after receiving it I put a 12 oz can of colors light in it an tryed to twist the lid on, it does not fit. Very disappointed as reading the reviews one said it hold a coors can.. well it holds it but you can’t screw the ring down on it to hold the can in.. But it has been almost a hour since I opened it an the beer is still cold, so that’s good. I will keep it, but just disappointed I can’t screw the lid down on a standard 12oz can of beer.. Guess I could always pour it into the inner can, but got the impression that wasn’t necessary..
customer_reviews.author: Ipad

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this. I love a really cold drink and for some reason the drinks didn't seem that cold in this. I do keep it in the fridge until ready to use it too. I love diet rootbeer and the can won't let me screw the top on correctly, so it is offset every time. I think the can is fatter at the top than it will allow for. I'm afraid I'm going to lose my drink all over myself when the lid comes off. The weight of the YETI also misleads you into thinking you have more drink left when it is gone :/
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This Yeti Rambler colster is a very nice item to keep your cans and bottles super cold. This kept my can cold just as if I removed it from the refrigerator at every drink, I was decently surprised. The build quality is super nice and everything comes together just right. The Yeti is very light weight and adds that additional girth to prevent accidental spillage of your favorite drinks. The included novelty can is a nice touch with the removal top. Overall very nice product and I will probably buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: JC Customs

customer_reviews.title: Great Coldster - Can and Bottle Holder
customer_reviews.text: A rather huge step up for keeping your drinks cold, real cold. Fits both cans and bottles. I really enjoy it keeping things COLD chilled, ...there are times that Texas gets warm in the Summer, this makes it all much better. Fits in my car holders. It has a great stainless uber functional vibe. A bit pricey, but it's a truly very nice functional object. It makes me cool and happy, it's a great thing that could help you out too.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Szabo

customer_reviews.title: SODA DRINKERS DREAM
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my canned diet cokes and it makes my soda last MUCH longer than normal. It makes it so I feel like I can take my time while drinking and I don't have to drink it all before it gets warm. I love this thing and use it every day. It makes the can slightly heavier but it's not bad. Sometimes I think I have more soda left when it's almost empty because the weight throws me off, but it also means my cat is less likely to bat my can off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Brown

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Drinks Cold
customer_reviews.text: If you use Yeti products you already know this, but it keeps drinks cold for what seems like forever. Solid construction, easy to clean, feels nice and feels like quality. Non slip grip means you can have this cooling your beverage in the summer heat and you get to keep it nice and cool and not have it slip out of a sweaty palm. It is like keeping your drink in the cooler every sip, without having the inconvenience of putting it back on ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go YETi !
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. No more warm drinks. I don’t get the reviews complaining about fake YETi products. This is the second YETi I purchase here and both were legit. Maybe Amazon is mixing up reviews for other products and posting them here (?) Not fair to the YETi company. I think Amazon could clean up their reviews a bit. Some really good products have reviwes that make no sense. We can tell it’s a competitor or someone just being unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle F

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff, Mine came in a plain white box, ...
customer_reviews.text: Knockoff, Mine came in a plain white box, no marketing sleeve around the coozie, no yeti logo on the rubber ring and no designed in Texas stamp on the bottom, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: landiann

customer_reviews.title: Yeti Beer Bottle/Can Coozie
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift. They fit any normal soda/beer can or glass beer bottle. I love these because they really due keep the beer cold for much longer. Also, the protect glass bottles from breaking when outside especially at the pool or beach. Great gift, highly recommend! Hope this review was helpful, let me know if you have any questions!
customer_reviews.author: The Fair Critic

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete product.
customer_reviews.text: Product was supposed to come with a top that i was unaware of until reading the paperwork for the product. Either they removed it before shipping to sell it after the fact or it failed to come with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Maverik259

customer_reviews.title: The best coolie ever.  Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great buy! I bought it for my husband as a gift and he loved it immediately. No more Luke warm cans of soda. No more watered down on ice soda. He pops his coolie can in the fridge to store it when he’s not using it and thinks the cold coolie keeps things colder even longer.. makes sense... a bit pricey as are all yeti products but sometimes you just have to pay the price because you get what you pay for. Yeti products are A1 in my book. We love everything Yeti that we’ve owned so far. Great products.
customer_reviews.author: Ozarkmountainhomegrown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, doesn’t fit all cans
customer_reviews.text: I love that this keeps my drinks cold and I mean cold!! I have to have my drinks cold or I won’t drink them & this does the job! I marked it down to 3 stars because unfortunately it doesn’t fit all cans. Big Coors light fans here..and the can is too tall to fit in and have the sealer lid screw on. I also noticed not ALL bottles fit in here as well. Perhaps I need to manage my expectations better. I still love this and use frequently, but I would of loved for it to fit the drink I intended to keep the coldest! Gotta keep those mountains blue!
customer_reviews.author: JB_Mama

customer_reviews.title: Toss Your Foam Coozies & Buy This
customer_reviews.text: I had a generic brand stainless steel coozie and it did the job, but would not fit bottles and the twist top felt cheap. I traded it in for the Yeti Colster and I’m not turning back. The overall quality is much higher and the twist top makes all the difference. It fits cans and bottles perfectly and I love the rust color. I use this daily with Bubly drinks and occasionally on a bottle of beer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. DONE.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. I’ve seen these around. I’ve heard friends rave about them. But I’ve resisted purchase. It’s just a koozie, right? NO. My parents bought me one of the regular YETI travel mugs a few months back and my mind was blown by how long it kept my cold brew cold all day. That was the final thing that convinced me. I’ve had the colarse for a week and I love it. Sitting around the house, sipping in the sun, taking the pup to the dog park - this thing does not disappoint. Your beer will be cold. I’ll travel with this. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bmore

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it is authentic yeti... it sorta keeps the can cool - I returned it
customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea - but the can cooler makes the can harder to drink out of - almost every time - I spilled part of the can on the way to my mouth - because the colster is bulky. I learned to work with it but it really does not significantly keep the beverage cooler. On the bottom of the product - also - it says "designed in the USA, assembled in China". Shame on you Yeti. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: OldManWorking

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my husband, but he drinks Coors and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband, but he drinks Coors and the cans are taller and thinner so it doesn't work for him. I can't find one that will fit the can his beer comes in. I use it for soda but that's not what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed ....I received wrong item....
customer_reviews.text: Same issue as others on here, ordered the colster with stash can and received lowball 10 oz. tumbler... Sent back and received refund.
customer_reviews.author: T. E.

customer_reviews.title: A normal 12 ounce can of Coca Cola is to ...
customer_reviews.text: A normal 12 ounce can of Coca Cola is to tall and the lid doesn't fit properly. Same with a 12 ounce can of Blue Moom
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD FARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but I decided to go ahead and purchase the Colster. It has surpassed my wildest expectations. I pop a soda out of the fridge and stick in the Colster and two hours later still cold enough to drink. Its a tight fit so no concerns about the can slipping out when I lift up. Really happy with my purchase and I have bought several for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Keep your beer in FULL SUNSHINE, and it still stays cool!
customer_reviews.text: We like to sit on our deck for happy hour - and most coozies sitting in the sun end up heating up your beer, so that by the end, it's warm. I don't typically drink my beer cold, but I like it cool. This keeps my beer cool - even when the beer is sitting in bright sunshine, where the exterior of the Yeti gets hot - the inside stays cool. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: Cool Beer Holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife to use for her Diet Coke. It keeps a can cold for quite a while. It's easy to hold and the different colors make it more appealing. Wish they weren't so expensive but it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Cornboy98

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Wrong item. Theybsent the wrong yeti item. But since I didn't realize until two days before I needed to give t as a gift I had not choice but gift the wrong one. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristeen

customer_reviews.title: Great, except Top Edge Gets in the Way of My Lip
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps things cold. Seems very sturdy, which probably why it is a bit heavier than I expected. Only short coming is the rather square edged retaining ring. Not enough of the can sticks up for me to readily get my lower lip on the can for sip. I should get better with more practice. But it seems an obvious oversight, unless my Diet Coke cans are somehow shorter than what this was designed around. (That is sarcasm, as the holder comes with a very clever "demo" can, which is no higher than my Diet Coke.)
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Real deal, keeps your beer cold.
customer_reviews.text: These are my first Yeti's, and so far I'm very happy with them. I was concerned because of all the reviews saying these were fake, but I believe these to be the real deal. Serial number registered just fine with Yeti and they have the laser etching on the bottom. Regardless, these help keep you beer cold for longer than it take me to drink the beer. In the hot Texas Sun, that's good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Rogoff

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fanfreakingtastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my yeti. I was a bartender a few years back and had several customers who had these yeti. At first I was skeptical, but once the customers came back for another can drink, they would hand me their empty can and it would still be as chilled as when I first gave it to them. Well worth the money and will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Ring does not fit around the top of the beer bottle to secure the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bit misleading. It does fit a regular soda can. But the description says that you can use it for a beer bottle holder also. The ring does not fit around the top of the beer bottle. The bottles are too tall. I haven't decided whether I'm going to return this or not. I drink out of beer bottles then I do cans
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: The reason 2 Stars is the cap does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Larger cans fully did not fit the last Yeti I was gifted, it was a 2.0. So I ordered the 1.0 shown here. The can fits fine even with the extenders. The problem is with the black screw on top. On the 2.0 there is a gasket, this one not really, just hard "plastic". I'll use it, but not 5 stars happy.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Mason

customer_reviews.title: Review of Yeti Rambler Coaster
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we now own and have a third one on the way. They keep water and soda very cold and also beer if you like it. They clean well and are very durable. We would highly recommend them to anybody wanting something to keep their beverages cold for a long time without a glass or ice.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore S.

customer_reviews.title: Say yes to the yeti
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but I have one I use all day everyday for a year now and the enameling is still great. After a few drops the bottom got a bit dented but I hammered it a little and now it sits level again. I can open a can before bed and wake up to a slightly cold pop when before without the yeti it was gross after that long. I used to throw away maybe the last 25% of a soda but now it stays cold no matter how long I take to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Terynn R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this with several bottles of beer, would not hold any of them. Would not work with a Corona bottle, Blue Moon bottle, or any of the Leinenkugel bottles. So, basically renders this thing useless to me. Might fit other cans/bottles, but I am 0 for 3 right now.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my beer cold for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Not that I ever have a beer last for more than 30 minutes, on the rare occasion that I've forgotten about it and left it out to sit somewhere around the house or outside on the deck, I've found my beer to still be quite cold, even after 2 or 3 hours. This little Rambler is a must have if you grill out a lot...
customer_reviews.author: S. Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Honestly amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I put a drink in it, left it in my car for over an hour on an 85 degree day, and when I came back out it was still quite cold. I actually lost one I was given for Father's Day, and I immediately had to buy another one. I really like to have my drinks cold, and this does the trick. You won't regret buying this Colster.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Your best friend in Cancún!
customer_reviews.text: This is my beer's BEST friend ever! Helps you to drink your beer slowly, you can actually enjoy every sip, no more need to chug your beer, you actually get to drink less since you drink slower now that you know it won't go warm on you while you go in the ocean! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Bejarano C

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Most of the Yeti products, from my perspective, have been good. This beer can holder is NOT a good product. I would not recommending buying it. If you want to keep your beer cold via Yeti, put it in one of the cups or mugs. If you want to drink from the can or a bottle, put the can or bottle in a beer coozie. Good luck! Stay well. Sally
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep your bev frosty cold to the last drop - so worth the $!!!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the taste of a super cold soda in a can, so I love a koozie and I was always putting my soda cans in the freezer for 5-10 min to make the coldness last in a neoprene koozie, but NO MORE with the Yeti! This is SOOO worth the money if you like your drink to stay cold! My last sip is as cold as my first! No more wasting money on beverages that got too warm to drink! I'm not big on paying big bucks just for a name, but I absolutely LOVE this Yeti and it is so worth every red cent!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for a couple of years. Finally left it elsewhere overnight. A can gets warm here in Texas in less than two minutes. I must have my trusty Yeti. Bought this one in case my original gets misplaced even temporarily. I go no where without my original Yeti. It just keeps cold beverages cold. Even in a hot car. I love my Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Warren

customer_reviews.title: Bottle extension
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the colsters for my husband and myself and we are very pleased with them. They work great with keeping things cold. However, I marked the colster down for one specific reason. It needs to come with an insulated extension for beer and water bottles. I ordered the extension that Amazon offers (3 pk) and the beer bottle is not secure, it wobbles around in the colster and I do not like that. The colster is great for cans but I happen to be a bottle person and feel certain I am not the only one. This is something they could address and make a good product become an excellent one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first ever drink cozy that actually keeps drinks cold! I’m amazed. I used it at the beach in 90- degree heat, and my beer stayed cold until it was finished. That is a first! Usually going to the beach means drinking warm beer, but no longer. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pittster65

customer_reviews.title: Fake or not....who cares it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Some say its fake some say they got a legit product. I am sure I got a fake but it sure looked real to me, came with all the items as pictured and it WORKED GREAT! I left my beer in 120* sun on accident when I was at the lake. The beer was 1/2 full and the yeti was VERY hot to the touch. I figured here goes nothing......the beer was COLD!!!
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: They are great for most every tin, with exception to some oddball sizes.
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have. I have them at both of my homes in the USA, my home in South America and I buy them for my friends and coworkers in SA. I typically work in hot humid climates and these keep my cans cold. Smoetime I hear folks say "I drink my beer so fast it doesn't have time to get warm", my reply is "yes, but mine is much colder right down to the last".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this doesn't even compare to others. I can leave a beer in this all day and never gets warm. When I'm drinking a bottle of water I throw it in here without the vacuum lid and it still keeps the whole bottle cold. I'm a yeti fan now and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Love Yeti tumblers and the Colster did not disappoint. Keeps my Coke well chilled and fizzy so much longer, without a dripping mess all over the patio table or coffee table. And, being a Philly Girl, it matches all of my Eagles garden decor and will be perfect for game day!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for mothers day because she used her regular yeti tumbler ALL the time but never has anything to put her beer in when she's at the pool so I know she will lover this! The color and everything is exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! I bought this for my boyfriend for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday, along with a skin and he was SOO excited. He takes it to the pool with him and it keeps a beer cold for about an hour, which is plenty long enough! A can fits perfectly inside, and with the black topper it does not clank around or move; it is very secure and snug. It can also be used for bottles. I personally love that YETIs are double wall insulated so they do not sweat or absorb the temperature to the outside. Your drink will be ice cold, but the outside is room temperature, dry and comfortable to hold! Would recommend this product to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: SAmmie

customer_reviews.title: Works Grest!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised! Works great, comfortable to hold, keeps drink cold and also holds bottles! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Noel Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great, came with a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, white color should help keep my drinks cool on the boat this summer. Surprisingly this was cheaper than the RTIC brand, usually I'm anti-Yeti but for 2/3rd the price I had to get one. Came with a bonus, fake can, you can use to store stuff inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good about Yeti...except the price tag
customer_reviews.text: But in retrospect you get what you pay for comes to mind too. I have used the traditional foam koozies and they suck at anything beyond keeping the cold off your hand. This in contrast kept a coke cold for about 6 hours sitting in 75 degree heat in the sun. At the end it was tepid but still not hot.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: Bad Gasket. Great Colster!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 of these in total because I loved them. However just this one has some issues with the screw on gasket. I hate returning the entire item when I know it's the gasket because it has issues no matter which cup you put it on so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Kroh

customer_reviews.title: The YETI Rambler Colster I received is an authentic YETI ...
customer_reviews.text: The YETI Rambler Colster I received is an authentic YETI. It has the imprinted logo on the bottom and the engraved 'designed in Austin, made in China'. It came with YETI stickers and pamphlet.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Insulates for  long time and not too expensive for a great brand!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum insulation keeps your drink cold for longer than other drink koozies i have used. It feels well built and I love that it holds cans as well as bottles. It even came with a free gift inside that was not mentioned in the description, which was an awesome surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Makes the beer dissipate too quickly
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with these is that the beer seems to dissipate faster. I always feel like there should still be a half a beer in the can, but it’s empty, so I end up having to replace the can more frequently. Other than that, it’s great, keeps the last sip as cold as the first. We own two and bought two for my brother and sister-in-law. Theirs had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: So amazing at keeping cans cold - bought 3 of them!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different insulating can/bottle holders, and by far this one is the best. It excels at keeping cans cold, and does a decent job with bottles. Be sure to keep the inner can that comes with the unit, as you should keep that in for skinny cans and/or skinny bottles.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adler

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs too.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I liked it, helps from keeping the dogs tail from knocking over our drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kmag

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Fit Cup Holder, 16oz Cans
customer_reviews.text: The description said it would fit in standard size cup holders. I have a 2019 Jetta and it doesn’t fit. Also, it doesn’t hold 16oz cans. Buy this product if you’re going to be holding a 12oz can. Do not buy it if you’re going to be traveling in a car or if you want anything larger than a standard 12oz can.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. We we're gifted them last Christmas and after a few hours one day of my drink on the counter I expted to throw it out...when it was still COLD I decided these were keepers. I bought them for several people as gifts this year. These are also durable. I have a teal color that hasn't as much as scratched. I have no fear the Navy will be just as great.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: I keep reading people say this is fake, not sure what they mean it comes with a warranty and you can register it. I got the silver stainless steel model. It works great and keeps my drink ice cold just like they say
customer_reviews.author: rick masters

customer_reviews.title: No good for Bud Light, Coors Light, or Miller Lite!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for cans but not for bottles as they advertise. Yeah a Corona will fit but bud light, coors light, or a miller light will not fit without the bottle falling out!!! They should tell you that only fits a few selected bottles because that’s why I bought it. For cans it’s great but you gotta buy a separate koozie for bottles to keep it from rattling and falling out. It only does half of what’s advertised so not gets 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was so happy to get this as a gift! He just realized how awesome YETI stuff is, so I was excited to get this for him. He is amazed at how cold it keeps his beer!! Definitely worth the money. Arrived in perfect condition with the cool YETI can inside and everything. Great gift!!! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Another great Yeti product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this koozie, I’ve referred several friends to Amazon after they saw the one I purchased. I love that it can hold both cans and longneck bottles. It also really does keep your drink cold for much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These Yeti Koozies are awesome. I bought two for myself and my wife. These kept our canned drinks cold on the beach in 90 degree temperatures for however long it took us to drink them. I left a drink in one of these in direct sunlight for 45 minutes. When I came back, the it was still ice cold. Well worth the money. They’re build really well and are holding up to abuse nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ZF

customer_reviews.title: Received item damaged TWICE
customer_reviews.text: While I can’t write a review for the product, I can say that they need to work on the packaging for shipment of this product. I received the first one, dent at the bottom. Sent it in for replacement. Second one showed up today, again dented. Both were mailed in a bubbler mailer. Ughhhh. This was an anniversary gift for my husband too.
customer_reviews.author: emraldia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love our new Yeti coolers. Keeps your drink cold. The only thing that is a con is, it's a little bit heavy so you think you still have something to drink in it but it's empty lol. Will def. purchase again in the future. Bought two. One in the teal and one in red. This product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! My order was sold by “JACQUELINE BIRCHENALL” and it’s definitely a real Yeti product. It keeps your drinks ice cold for a long, long time. It works well for both cans and bottles. Some cans fit better than others though. For example, Budweiser cans are a bit tight because they are a little shorter and wider than most, while Coors light cans are taller and narrow. They all fit bit the collar might screw on harder for some.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Screw-On Top!
customer_reviews.text: Tried Hydro-Flask, rubber lid/gasket failed within weeks. Yeti has a higher insulation rating and the screw-on gasket top is the correct solution. Check prices, some colors are twice the price of others.
customer_reviews.author: Rock O'clock

customer_reviews.title: Top gasket was already cracked upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Love Yeti Products! However, the Rambler might be a weak spot for this company. I received my rambler colster on 9/9/19. I unpacked it and noticed the top gasket that holds the can in place was cracked. Why use plastic for this part? Creates a weak spot on an otherwise solid product.
customer_reviews.author: the walton's

customer_reviews.title: F A N T A S T I C
customer_reviews.text: $20 for a can Koozie ? best koozie I have had the pleasure of drinking hops and barley from. keeps the Nectar of the God's ICY cold !!! truly amazed and extremely happy with the product. on the fence ???? Do It .. pull the trigger. buy it !! this thing is AWESOME!!! Works GREAT even in the AZ heat.
customer_reviews.author: RON YOUNGBERG JR

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Due to the weight of the can cooler you never know when you need a new beer until its too late lol. Thats the only downfall, however its many good qualities out weight this. Keeps your favorite beverage cold for hours and thats all that truly matters, am i right?
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this color and have already used this so much more than I expected to. I was gifted one of these ages ago and donated it thinking I didn’t need it. So handy on these hot days to keep my sparkling water cold. It keeps it cold for hours!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: When I got it it was chipped and I believe the vacuum seal is leaking. My regular koozi keeps my drink cool Just as long and I got it free lol
customer_reviews.author: Mr Cox

customer_reviews.title: FAKE/COUNTERFEIT YETI
customer_reviews.text: Received the package of what I thought would be two Yeti rambler colsters. They are certainly counterfeit. Came without can insert that holds bottles. Lid will not even twist on with can inside. Label on the outside looks like a glitchy computer image. Definitely a fake Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my husband... he loved it! So I ended up getting one for almost every one I know (either as a birthday or Christmas or thank you gift!) they are a crowd pleaser ((without being overly expensive))
customer_reviews.author: Fleming Family

customer_reviews.title: It’s a yeti - so it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two for our friends to enjoy our cold beverages on the lake in 90 degree weather. I ended up feeling bad if anyone had to use a “regular koozy” because they are pretty useless at keeping your beverages cold... so I bought two more! Everyone loves them. The last sip is NEVER warm!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST COOZIE YET I
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY SIS AND AM GOING TO BUY MORE! IT COMES IN GREAT COLORS, IS EASY TO CLEAN, HOLD ON TO AND HAS A SECRET IN STORE FOR ITS PURCHASER!:) IT REALLY KEEPS AN ICE COLD CAN OF ANYTHING, ICE COLD FOR HOURS OR UNTIL ITS GONE... WHICHEVER COMES FIRST. CHEERS
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!!  You will not be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was an official Yeti brand product. Cane with authentication sticker on bottom. If u want something to keep your canned bevgs. Cold BUY THIS! It keeps my drink EXACTLY as cold as the first sip for 2-4 hours depending on temp around it.
customer_reviews.author: Relb Dee

customer_reviews.title: even during the summer months you can comfortably sit a cold beverage into the YETI Rambler Colster ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally don't have to pour out those warm cans of beer. even during the summer months you can comfortably sit a cold beverage into the YETI Rambler Colster Can and Bottle Holder and it stays the same temperature for ~30 (this is in the hot sun). on a day in the 60s this thing will keep your drinks cold until you finished drinking them. well over an hour and a half. if it takes you that long to drink a 12oz can then unfortunately we're not going to hang out.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Slugworth

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Fit Diet Coke Can
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my Coke can. My husband was and still is in the hospital when it arrived. I saw it did not fit, but this is first chance I have had to return item. It is brand new, right out of the box, never got to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Can Drinkers
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little colster. I prefer to drink my soda out of a can, and this keeps it cold for MUCH longer than any other koozie. It doesn’t work as well as other YETI products though, and it could be improved a little, so I gave it 4 stars. I love the color! It also came with a target practice can inside, which I gave to my son to shoot at.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This changes everything! Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing ever. I like my vans to stay cool regardless of where I am, and this changes everything. Keeps it cool for hours and I do t feel like i have to be in a hurry to finish my Drink. Love this. Great for a gift, office gift exchange, birthday present, you name it!
customer_reviews.author: Salanika

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I received a genuine YETI, tried it out and it works as advertised. It kept my beer cold to the end. It loses a star for being slightly damaged on arrival, small dent on bottom. I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Redcatcher

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a beer person this is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was sick of my beer getting hot quickly. I had other insulated can holders but this is something else. It will keep the beer or any other beverage cold from start to finish. It’s awesome! It’s very sturdy and light. Def a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and just as described BUT my husband says his lip doesn't fit between the top of the holder and the beer can which makes it awkward to drink. I am very disappointed because I wanted him to use it Father's day weekend and he didn't. It was a true YETI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the real deal
customer_reviews.text: i haven't gotten a chance to use this yet, but figured I'd throw a review on here to let people know that this was an authentic yeti coozie/colster. while it didn't come in a box (coozie was in a plastic bag), but inside was all the yeti paperwork etc alone with the false can. i have no doubts it will live up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It works REALLY well
customer_reviews.text: The one we bought from Amazon does not match the one we bought from Dick's, so we are returning the fake one. It happens, oh well. As for the colster itself, the thing is amazing. Keeps drinks cold forever. Sure, it's a bit pricey for a glorified koozie, but if you can afford it I say get one ASAP. As for people saying Coors Light cans won't fit, that is false. If you use the fake can that comes with the colster, you can use it to hold thinner Coors Light cans as well as 12oz bottles. For even thinner cans like 12 oz Red Bull, you'll need an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: YETI Rambler Colster, Vacuum Insulated, Stainless Steel Drink Insulator
feature_bullets: DuraCoat Color that is built to last - no fading, peeling, or cracking here
The Load-and-Lock Gasket secures your drink in place while the Colster’s double-wall vacuum insulation keeps your beer or soda frosty longer
No Sweat Design, which means you say adios to damp or frostbitten hands
Only the Genuine YETI Colster includes a Collector Stash Can with lid to hide your valuables. Watch out for fakes
Holds tight to 12 oz. standard bottles and cans

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
